```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(lubridate)
dates <- seq(ymd(today()), ymd(today()) + dweeks(6), by = '1 day')
hrs <- 6:23
microscopes <- c("Olympus BX61", "Zeiss Discovery V8", "Zeiss Axiovert", "Zeiss LSM DUO", "TILL Photonics iMIC")
dayschedule <- data.frame(replicate(length(microscopes), rep("", length(hrs))))
colnames(dayschedule) <- microscopes
rownames(dayschedule) <- hrs
```

```{r}
captions <- paste0("**",dates, "**. WRITE CLEARLY YOUR **FULL NAME** and **GROUP**! [Taavi PÃ¤ll](taavi.pall@ttu.ee). [Info and pricing at GTI](http://bit.ly/2fNytTm)")
tabfun <- function(x) knitr::kable(dayschedule, 
                                   booktabs = TRUE, 
                                   caption = x, 
                                   row.names = TRUE,
                                   align = 'c', 
                                   pad = 6)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
out <- lapply(captions, tabfun)
names(out) <- dates -1
out
```
